Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: One Oankar, the primal energy, realized through the grace of divine preceptor

Bhai Vir Singh.translation: au`lU nUM (cwnxw) sUrj nhIˆ id`sdw, krmW dw hIxw hY[

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Who would bow before those who are without merit and get themselves called Guru
